column4: kenBW I see on the Ubunto mainpage a check box i overlooked.  is that how I get the alternet install?
Great thanks KenBW.  Thanks all.  see ya
Hey KenBW, i got another question.  got a sec?
ok, what is the fast/easy way to get my laptop HD to be bootable with CD drivers so i can get to this new UbuntU CD?
you mean it wont boot from CD?
not sure how being old affects things, but your BIOS is probably the best place to tlook
the boot sequence will probably be set to Floppy, then Hard Drive. then CD
the Bios is the latest and very old.  I need to format the drive with something like a DOS that has universal CD drivers.  I cannot use the floppy AND the CD at the same time
i don't really know alot about this, but you could try looking at the setup
I thought bootdisk.org but thought you guys might have an idea
I gonna try bootdisks.org.  I'll be back if it dont work.
